title: Instant arson: testing firebombs and incendiaries
brief_description: Discusses the effects of arson with firebombs and chemical incendiaries as ignition sources, and demonstrates different methods of extinguishing the resulting fire.
description: Discusses the effects of arson with firebombs and chemical incendiaries as ignition sources, and demonstrates different methods of extinguishing the resulting fire.
